org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.emf.types

Class EMFPatternTypeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.typing.AbstractTypeProvider
      • org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.typing.XbaseTypeProvider
        • org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.emf.types.EMFPatternTypeProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEMFTypeProvider, org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.typing.ITypeProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenModelBasedTypeProvider

    public class EMFPatternTypeProvider
extends org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.typing.XbaseTypeProvider
implements IEMFTypeProvider
    An extension of the XbaseTypeProvider for infering the correct types for the pattern variables. It handles all constraints in the model which can modify the outcome of the type, but it has some practical limitations, as the calculation of the proper type can be time consuming in some cases.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public org.eclipse.xtext.common.types.JvmTypeReference getVariableType(Variable variable)
        Description copied from interface: IEMFTypeProvider
        Calculates the JVM type of the selected variable. The calculation includes the inference of the corresponding EMF type, and then the calculation of corresponding Java class.
